Package src

Class Server

Object
Server
public class Server extends Object
Server
The server will receive requests from the client and process them accordingly
The server will then send a response back to the client
Version:
1.0
Author:
Lee Juin

    • getClientDetails

      public static ClientDetails getClientDetails(DatagramPacket request)
      Get the client details from the request
      Parameters:
      request - DatagramPacket encapsulating the request message
      Returns:
      ClientDetails object containing the client's address and port

    • sendReply

      public static void sendReply(int requestID, DatagramPacket request, byte[] replyBuffer, boolean storeReply, boolean isBroadcast)
      Send a response to the client
      Parameters:
      requestID - Request ID
      request - DatagramPacket encapsulating the client details
      replyBuffer - Buffer containing the response data
      storeReply - Boolean to indicate if the reply should be stored
      isBroadcast - Boolean to indicate if the reply is a broadcasted message

    • getRequests

      public static HashMap<ClientDetails,Integer> getRequests()
      Get the map of clients to their latest request ID
      Returns:
      HashMap of ClientDetails to their latest request ID

    • isRequestDuplicated

      public boolean isRequestDuplicated(ClientDetails clientDetails, int requestID)
      Check if the request is duplicated
      Parameters:
      clientDetails - ClientDetails object containing the client's address and port
      requestID - Request ID
      Returns:
      True if the request is duplicated, false otherwise

    • updateRequest

      public static void updateRequest(ClientDetails clientDetails, int requestID)
      Update the request ID for the client
      Parameters:
      clientDetails - ClientDetails object containing the client's address and port
      requestID - Request ID

    • getReplyMessages

      public static HashMap<Integer,byte[]> getReplyMessages(ClientDetails clientDetails)
      Get the reply messages for the client
      Parameters:
      clientDetails - ClientDetails object containing the client's address and port
      Returns:
      HashMap of request ID to reply message

    • addReplyMessage

      public static void addReplyMessage(ClientDetails clientDetails, int requestID, byte[] replyMessage)
      Add the reply message to the map
      Parameters:
      clientDetails - ClientDetails object containing the client's address and port
      requestID - Request ID
      replyMessage - Reply message
